title: Earthlings WeWow Day 2: Just Bugging Around!
description:
Mindy, Guy Raz and Dennis are on the road in the Wow on Wheels on Day 2 of Earthlings WeWow! Join them for a special bug scavenger hunt, and then go out into your world and explore like a real scientist! Do you see any bugs around your neighborhood? Share with us what you find by leaving us a message at 1-888-7WOW-WOW for a chance to be featured on Friday's episode, or send us a photo to tinkercast.com/share.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
